abstract.text: Sets the switching behavior of the primary constituent device.

inlineContent.text: The switching behavior to set on the device.
Sets the conditions during which the system restricts switching cameras.
Setting the switching behavior to a value other than
requires that you set this argument to an empty option set.
Use this method to configure the camera switching behavior of a capture device. Before calling it, determine if a device supports configuring its device switching behavior by querying the device’s
, attempting to configure its switching behavior results in an error.

code: // Exit early if the device doesn't support configuring switching behavior.

inlineContent.text: When recording using an instance of
, you may override the switching behavior by calling the movie file output’s

abstract.text: Work with audiovisual assets, control device cameras, process audio, and configure system audio interactions.
An object that represents a hardware or virtual capture device like a camera or microphone.
A structure that defines the conditions in which to restrict camera switching.
Constants that control when to allow a virtual device to switch its active primary constituent device.
The device restricts fallback camera selection to certain conditions.
A virtual device’s active primary constituent device.
The conditions that restrict camera switching behavior for the active primary constituent device.
The switching behavior of the active constituent device.
The fallback devices to use when a constituent device with a longer focal length becomes limited by its light sensitivity or minimum focus distance.
The conditions that restrict the primary constituent device’s switching behavior.
The switching behavior for the primary constituent device.
Sets the switching behavior of the primary constituent device.
The constituent devices available to select as a fallback for a longer focal length primary constituent device.
A capture output that records video and audio to a QuickTime movie file.
Sets the camera switching behavior to use during recording.

inlineContent.text: The switching behavior to set on the device.
Sets the conditions during which the system restricts switching cameras.
Setting the switching behavior to a value other than
requires that you set this argument to an empty option set.
